Reviews.Title: USB reads only music and pictures.. The rest is good
Reviews.Author: Sid
Reviews.Content: When we purchased the tv there were no reviews as it had not even hit the market. so we took a chance hoping new technology is always better than any old one. We had a budget of under 650$ and I had some basic requirements like a HD input and USB ports. We have been using the tv for a little less than 3 weeks now.PROSThe tv is packed with intelligent technology like light sensor to match the lighting of the screen to that of the room for comfortable viewing and clear sound i guess to make the levels of dialogues stand out from background noise in movies.The tv has a very quick refresh rate.. reduces the stress on the eyes if you are a TV surfer.It is extremely simple to operate.. one would think that latest tech came with complicated controls.. but the remote and the control options put you at ease immediately.There are two HD input slots for your cable box and your PS/Xbox etc..CONSNow this is a BIG one and has me upset to no end. The USB reads only music and pictures. It doesn't play movies etc. One of the main reasons for me to purchase the TV was that and it let me down.So if you think you don't need the USB like I do, then you have no reason to shy away from this TV.

Reviews.Title: No Audio Output!
Reviews.Author: Ziggy
Reviews.Content: I would normally give an LG product "5 Stars", but this model does not have an audio output, so there is no way* to connect to an A/V receiver that I know of.  I would not have bought this TV if I knew that.  Hopefully, this review will help someone else from making the same mistake I did.  The TV does have a good picture in both SD and HD.*If connected directly from OTA (over-the-air) antenna, or cable.Update 12/24/12:  Since I now have a Dish Joey I connected the audio out from the Joey to the Bose Solo I recently purchased from Amazon.com.  The sound now rivals many 5.1 speaker setups.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV, but we are returning it ...
Reviews.Author: WendyLou
Reviews.Content: Amazingly clear picture quality. Not 'jumpy' at all. The colors are clear and vibrant. The sound is ok, but there is no audio output to allow connecting a sound bar or exterior speakers (at least that we have found), so we will be returning it. We have purchased a comparable Samsung model for the same price that does have audio output. Bummer. This is a spectacular TV for the size and price.

Reviews.Title: Know what you want!
Reviews.Author: Dean
Reviews.Content: I was pricing LG tvs for a while when I came accross this gem. I was torn between a more expensive LED vs more economical LCD. Both were fairly feature rich (multiple hdmi, etc) but when i got down to my main reason for a new tv - i discovered i want quality, reliability and a good picture - not features. I get netflix through xbox, so i dont need a smart tv, i dont need to  connect 12 devices, 3d is lame at best, so  I purchased a decent sound system to go with the tv and called it a day. It's true the tv has no audio out whatsoever - which I find quite unusual - but it could be the reason for the great price. My universal remote turns everything on and controls the volume, my sound runs directly from cable box /Xbox to my stereo. No issues at all. And the picture is terrific! Just my 2c worth... Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Great Set
Reviews.Author: Lee Feder
Reviews.Content: I'm definitely not an A/V nerd or snob, but I do try to not waste money on an inferior product.  This TV is beautiful and it makes me what kind of drugs TV salesman are on when the insist you need the newest technology to enjoy sports.  I've watched two action movies and the Olympics on this 60 Hz TV and want to know what I could possibly see wrong with - it has perhaps the most beautiful picture of any television I've ever seen.If you're looking for a base-level TV with no bells/whistles but a BEAUTIFUL picture, this is it.  Truly an affordable beauty.

Reviews.Title: Ummmmm
Reviews.Author: KRome
Reviews.Content: You're supposed to hook audio out of the cable box not the tv ..... out of the tv will cause an albeit barely noticeable, yet still present audio lag...... People....

Reviews.Title: Good Choice For a Bedroom TV!
Reviews.Author: Kit Caboose "The Spleen"
Reviews.Content: We've had the LG 42LS3400 for about 2 weeks now.  I paid $530 at BJ's Wholesale Club.  It was a simple setup and the directions made sense for once.  Right now we are using the stand but I will be mounting it on the wall this weekend.  We also have Comcast for TV service.  The LG factory settings made the colors looked rather bland and washed out so I've been tweaking the color, tint, brightness, contrast settings.  I think I have the picture looking pretty good now.  At least the colors are more vibrant now and peoples faces don't look like a pallid corpse in a casket anymore.  However, we do have an older 42" Sony LCD HDTV in another room that frankly has a better picture.  That said, that Sony cost us $2500  about 5-6 years ago.  So spending $530 for the LG is just fine.  We have the LG in the bedroom and we are not into Blue Ray, DVD's, DVR's, TiVo, etc.  We just wanted a good, crisp TV picture so we could at least watch the news, some sports and read the words and numbers scrolling across the screen on every channel.  The LG 42LS3400 has a refresh rate of 60Hz but there is no blurring, "judder" or ghosting even watching fast action football games.  I also think the sound is very good.  I don't understand all the whining about a lousy, tinny sound.  I use the remote from Comcast and it kind of sucks.  It has more buttons than an accordion.Bottom line for me is; the LG 42LS3400 is a pretty good TV.  A Sony or a Samsung might be marginally better but you'd pay far more for those.  So the LG 42LS3400 is definitely the better value for your money and it looks just fine.  We do not want or need a Smart TV with internet connectivity saddled with all the buttons, bells and whistles.  The LG 42LS3400 may not be as eye-popping as a Sony or a Samsung but it is much less expensive, easy to setup, easy to use, easy on the eyes and is a perfect choice for a bedroom TV.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LS3400
Reviews.Author: Eestlane
Reviews.Content: We have had the product now for 2 - 3 weeks, and it has performed flawlessly. We bought it to replace an old, original 21" Magnavox; the latter had started having minor problems.Being "old", I had to have my son-in-law come and adjust the color settings. My wife, who is an artist, found the initial (factory) settings unacceptable.The Amazon purchasing process was very smooth, the delivery was exactly as promised and price was very satisfactory.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: R. Newberry
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV also. It didn't even occur to me to ask if it had OUTPUTS to hook up to a home theater system. Guess what? NO OUTPUTS for anything! I contacted LG and was told this television was the ONLY television with no outputs. WTF????? If you want to hook it up to external speakers, etc. you are screwed. I have to take it back...

Reviews.Title: Lg 32" LED
Reviews.Author: Na
Reviews.Content: Good bedroom TV. Very basic features, but sound and picture are very good for the price. Enclosed stand does not swivel or tilt at all.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Korrina
Reviews.Content: Being that this is my first HDTV, I can't really compare it to another specific one, but from what I have, it's just been amazing.  The quality of the picture on the screen is crisp and bright, the volume adjusts very well, they even have a setting where it dims if you have the tv on at night in the dark (I sometimes fall asleep with the TV on so that helps).  For the price it's a great bargain, I was in WalMart the other day and they had another 32 in. for the same price but a no name brand.  How could you beat this?! :)  I definitely recommend this TV to other people.  DO NOTE ONE THING: I took a star off because when you are putting the pieces together, you will need a skinny screwdriver as any mechanical ones can't fit into the tight space where 2 of the screws go.  That was the only hard part.  This also doesn't come with and HDMI cable and I don't know if TVs usually do so just a heads up.  Other than that though, great TV!

Reviews.Title: tv made easy
Reviews.Author: Laurel R. Barron
Reviews.Content: great picture, not a lot of bells and whistles but that was what we wanted. I really like this product. Easy to set up, easy to use. Would highly recommend this if you don't need to have all the internet things on it. The only thing keeping this from 5 stars is the sound could be better.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LED TV for the $.
Reviews.Author: Deepsea21
Reviews.Content: I performed a great deal of research and read numerous reviews before I selected this TV.  While it does not offer all of the bells and whistles that the latest and greatest TV's offer, what it lacks in gizmos it makes up for in spectacular picture quality, color rendering and an extra wide viewing angle all of which exceed many far higher priced TV's.  This is also a backlit LED (not side).  Like all TV's you'll probably want to visit some review sites and custom calibrate the color to their exact specifications if you are like me and are never fully happy with the factory settings.  This TV gives lots of options to tinker with the picture to your liking.  When calibrated, this TV is like looking out your window... I think the color rendering is as close to perfect as you can get.  This is a 60HZ tv.. not 120HZ.  The 240HZ or 480HZ have been called pure nonsense and a money making gimmic.  I personally saw no difference between the 60HZ and 120HZ but maybe you can...  if so they make this TV at 120HZ as well but you'll pay more.  Personally, 60HZ works just fine for me.  If I were to guess 60HZ works better on a quality screen like this than 120HZ on a cheaper one where $ has been spent on more gizmos you won't use.  Overall, an excellent purchase for a 42" LED at around $500.  Check it out in a store and compare it to the higher priced TV's on the wall... especially the viewing angle!  This TV has one of the widest viewing angles out there.

Reviews.Title: Great deal and great picture
Reviews.Author: Stephen
Reviews.Content: This is the ideal tv for your everyday tv watcher. If you need a high refresh rate for gaming or something else, you need more Hz's. I only watch a couple shows, football, and maybe a movie here and there and this was a great deal for the size and clarity. HDMIs are good, sound is good, picture is good. Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Peet
Reviews.Content: I really have no complaints about this TV. It has an awesome picture. Sound is good for TV speakers. I highly recommend this TV. Could have one more HDMI input but it's not a big deal. Factory settings suck. Take the energy saving setting off and it comes to life. I like that you can have different picture settings for each input.

Reviews.Title: Works well, not discribed well
Reviews.Author: Richard Schmidt
Reviews.Content: Though I like the TV and the picture is great, the description on Amazon was way off.  I planned to put it in a 30" wide cabinet, so I ordered a TV that was described as 29.5" wide.  When it arrived, it measured 32" and didn't fit where I wanted it.  From now on, I'll buy from Costco, where I can take my tape measure before I buy.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for me--Do research and make sure it has what YOU need
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: This LG LED is a superb TV for the money (it was less than $300 at time of my purchase).  Please note there are only 2-HDMI inputs and no audio-output.  The picture is great, with a lot of settings to tinker with.  I was surprised the sound was more than adequate even at low levels (though my bedroom is small).I purchased a Roku box for the TV, attaching via HDMI to the TV.  As a result, this is now a "Smart TV" with wifi/netflix/pandora/etc.  At 32 inches, noticeable differences in 1080p vs. 720p(this model) is negligible.  I have no complaints whatsoever about the picture quality.  One more HDMI input would have been nice, but other than that, this is a great buy from a good brand.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice
Reviews.Author: Travis Hopkins
Reviews.Content: So far this TV is everything that I hoped it could possibly be.  The picture is the best of any HDTV I have ever owned, and setup is very easy from a picture quality standpoint.  Sound quality is also outstanding!  My one and only complaint was that during assembly of putting the base onto the TV 2 of the 4 screws you need to put into the stand are extremly hard to get into position without a long stem philips head screwdriver that has a magnetic tip.  If you have one of those or can get one then assembly is simple.  Without one add about 10 minutes or so to assembly.  Otherwise everything is fantastic

Reviews.Title: No audio outputs, otherwise good
Reviews.Author: Paul J
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is great and the price was right.  If you're an audio buff though, this is not the TV for you.  There is no audio output jack(s) from the TV; the HDMI jack is input only.  If you're watching TV, the ONLY audio you can get is from the built-in TV speakers (which work fine, but they're obviously not the stereo quality).  Also, the brightness setting likes to reset itself on the energy efficient setting, which can be a little annoying, but it's not at all difficult to switch it back on a regular basis.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: bat911
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing for the price. My first LG product and I love it. Great Picture Quality. The sound quality is amazing as well better than on most LED TV's out there. If you watch a lot of sports this is probably not the TV for you because of the 60hz refresh rate. I am returning it for another LG tv with 120hz refresh rate just to watch football lol

Reviews.Title: Love TV
Reviews.Author: bamajohn1
Reviews.Content: I love my TV. Another brand is said to be the best, I have one of that brand and this LG has just as good of a picture and is easy to operate. Would recomend this LG TV to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Great first bigger screen
Reviews.Author: Relishh
Reviews.Content: Well I can tell you this is a great first big screen for the living room.Fits our room just right.Was concerned with the set bacause when the sipping company showed up set was on the side the long way (and I know there not suppost to be) but no problems upon opening and inspection.Hooked everthing up and no problems.!!!!

Reviews.Title: If you can find this model you will be happy too
Reviews.Author: Christine Anyalai
Reviews.Content: Really great picture. The colors are so vibrant it's like I never had a color TV till now.I do not know why this model is discontinued. I am very happy with my purchase and hope to be for years to come

Reviews.Title: good one... not the best..
Reviews.Author: Adam Aniz
Reviews.Content: Not the best out there.. But an nice entry level model.go for TVs with 120hz or higher if you are fan of gaming [xbox/ps3].

Reviews.Title: Didn't last much more than one year before taking 10-12 minutes to turn on to get both sound and picture - disappointed
Reviews.Author: Michelle' Amazon
Reviews.Content: LG 32-inch LS34 LCD LED HDTV - bought this TV at Target last year, and was never able to get it to hook up to stereo speakers or TV speakers as we have done before with our other TV's, even though it appears to have the hook up capability in the back.  The day after Cyber Monday, it starts taking several tries to turn it on to get both the sound and the picture. Sometimes we see vertical lines on the screen before the picture comes in, like it is breaking. Very disappointed in this LG. To get it repaired will cost more than to buy a new TV on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: new best friend
Reviews.Author: H. Riley
Reviews.Content: great color and sound. I love it! It has a shut-off timer that comes in handy. It's my best friend.

Reviews.Title: Goog buy
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Perfect for our livingroom picture is great price was awesome deliverary was rapid! LOVE IT would recommend it to anybody

Reviews.Title: Tv
Reviews.Author: Patrice Moncur
Reviews.Content: Tv screen was damaged......very disappointed! Item factory refurbished but look very used. Further, there is a crack on the screen....about six inch long.

Reviews.Title: LG 32- Inch
Reviews.Author: clayton lewis
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice buy and if you can get it like me ( with points) even better . I was worried about the shipping handling of it when it arrived , but so far so good

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Folly "Folly"
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, and 6 months after purchase it's still working perfectly. I'd recommend this TV to anyone.No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Paul J. Lynch
Reviews.Content: Nice picture.  Good sound.  Nice size.  Fits out den perfectly.  We have had it a year now and we literally have no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Denise2012
Reviews.Content: I use it as a TV and second monitor on my apple computer amazing resolution great overall tv for the price

Reviews.Title: Not worth for the amount paid
Reviews.Author: Srikar
Reviews.Content: Hi,I have bought this product and found that its not worth for the money what i paid for this. The screen is not so good as compared to other LCD's. So think before buying this product.

Reviews.Title: Great picture clear and good color
Reviews.Author: Don Watson
Reviews.Content: Tv  was to my specifications and fit into the space which I had specified and has a great clear picture and the controls are easy to adjust

Reviews.Title: No way to hook this up to my sound system.
Reviews.Author: T-Bone
Reviews.Content: The picture is great but there is no way to connect this to my sound system. The Bose techs said I would need additional adapters to make it work.  Even Consumer Reports failed to raise this as an issue.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: DeLondra Ellis
Reviews.Content: Great picture, good sound from the TV, it gets pretty loud, (though I will be adding an LG sound bar in the future for movies and music). Very easy assembly, channel set up was a breeze, and simple controls in the TV and remote make switching from TV to Xbox effortless. Overall I love it! It arrived when expected. The box was pretty beat up but the TV itself was in perfect condition so no complaint!

Reviews.Title: Thoroughly Satisfied With My Purchase
Reviews.Author: Amy D Merritt
Reviews.Content: I love my TV.  It was the perfect price.  There's no audio output but it doesn't bother me...I'm not a techie into all that stuff.  It came with a remote and was fairly easy to set up.

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: wulf "Wulf"
Reviews.Content: The LG TV is really great. With HD it feels like your practicaly right in the screen.  The Nature shows are especially good. No complaints.  Amazon Service was great.Diane Igielski

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Hopey
Reviews.Content: This tv works great. It has a good picture with lots of features. Good design. Fits my family room perfectly.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Lilian Sanchez
Reviews.Content: LG 32LS3400 32 Inch, is an excellent price for quality!..... and the product it's just that a i need right now

Reviews.Title: Had to be fixed quick
Reviews.Author: cfsdays
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up and configure to my liking, but after only two days, it started making crackling noises and shut itself off.  Had to have LG tech come out and replace the computer board.  Since then, it's worked fine.

Reviews.Title: Poor Audio
Reviews.Author: Ronald E. Irons
Reviews.Content: The picture on this TV is very good.  However the audio is not good and there is no equalizer option to fine tune frequency response.  Using Bass and Treble controls is just  not an adequate basis for adjustment.  Further there is no audio output so external speakers could be used to substitute for the internal ones.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: J. Pagan
Reviews.Content: parents love the tv.  looks great and it fits the space of their old tv.  Had to get them a blueray player with wifi and now they can enjoy more movies.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Music Lovers
Reviews.Content: We are enjoying this tv in our bedroom. It is a good size and compatible with most of our stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Jackson
Reviews.Content: Purchased this TV for our bedroom. Great to have such a slim TV after our old tube TV. Once you get the picture adjusted to the way you like it it's very good. When I unpacked the TV I was missing a couple of screws. I emailed LG and they mailed them out right away. Overall it an excellent value and once again Amazon had the best price.

Reviews.Title: product rating
Reviews.Author: donsans
Reviews.Content: Product arrived promptly and in perfect condition.  I researched this tv comparing it to many others.  I am very pleased with my decision and look forward to many years of viewing.

Reviews.Title: LG 42LS3400
Reviews.Author: Richard M. Torres
Reviews.Content: item it's not so hot i was not impressed on quality of tv considering its and LG and the specs that this tv has also it has no audio outputs of anykind not listed on specsthe Sellers customer service was great and made things rightrichard t.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Has all the features you could ever need and the picture is so realistic looking, awesome clearity! Well worth the price.

Reviews.Title: LGTV
Reviews.Author: Dolores Candido
Reviews.Content: The reception is great.  So clear.  I would recommend it for anyone who needs a new television.  Can't think of anything more to say.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: pvtsarg
Reviews.Content: its pretty good it does what its suppose to do im currently deployed so a tv is a tv in afghanistan

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Justme
Reviews.Content: Received the Item in a timely manner, actually arrived on a Saturday when it was suppose to arrive on Monday.  Setup was easy and no problem.  Picture quality is as expected as well as sound.  Only negative option is the Energy Saver Mode which when activated will make the picture dark at times.  So the solution to this is just not to use that option.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV, But Not for Gaming
Reviews.Author: sir
Reviews.Content: All in all, the TV works just fine. Nothing all that special. The menu's are less than perfect, and annoyingly laggy. But the picture is niceBut if you're a gamer, I would recommend Not getting this one. It has some input lag. Which isn't an issue if you dont play fps's, or anything reaction time based.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality OK
Reviews.Author: Kat Cooke
Reviews.Content: This TV is great for kids and gaming but if you are watching movies on it a lot I think you would need a higher step up in quality. I would recommend to people with kids for the economy.

Reviews.Title: Bargain LED
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: I really like this TV for around $300. It is fairly good looking from the front and sides meaning it bezel is small and its thickness is pretty low for a TV this cheap. This makes it come in at under 20 lbs for a 32 inch screen. The picture is great, and at 32" the 720p only becomes noticeable from 1080p at around 4 feet or closer. I have never been let down by the picture. For a bargain TV it has enough connections, 2 HDMI is the absolute minimum as the are used up with an Xbox and a sound system. I thought the sound performed well for a TV this size, but as I desired it to fill a 10x12 room I had to add a small sound system. I am slightly disappointed when comparing it to the LG 32CS460 32-Inch 720p 60 Hz LCD HDTV, which is the LCD version. Even though you step up to LED you get the exact same frame, meaning it is not thinner like most LEDs. I do feel the picture is a lot better though as the LED do a better job of generating light. (brighter whites and that sort of thing.Pros:+Physically attractive looking bargain TV+Great picture for priceCons:-Not thinner than LCD model-Underwhelming sound-Bare minimum 2 HDMIs

Reviews.Title: LG 42LS3400 42 inch 1080 Pix/60 Hz, LED-LCD
Reviews.Author: Frank J. Mendolia "Book Worm"
Reviews.Content: My, wife who's in a nursing home, requested a LG based upon my reviews on the Internet.  LG was consistently rated 4 to 5 stars.The maintenance department easily removed the LG from its packaging and just connected it to the cable provided by the Nursing Home.  The LG came on instantly with a superior picture and, more importantly, my wife wasn't disappointed by this product.Although it's only n 10 days old, we're hoping that it will last for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Very good television
Reviews.Author: W. Malone "Bill"
Reviews.Content: We are very happy with this TV.  Good picture and sound.  Easy to set up.  Excellent price.  We have no issues with the product.
